short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the relevant IMDB page for whatever you're currently watching on Netflix, quickly and easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: While watching Netflix, this tool will allow you to quickly open up the IMDB page in a new tab for the episode or movie that you're currently watching, without having to search manually for it.
